DESCRIPTION: Whenever a lunatic enemy attacks or applies a debuff, a random enemy is targeted instead.
A 1 cost Attack that deals damage, Retains, and exhausts.
A 1 cost Skill that gains Block, Retains, and exhausts.
Vigorous creatures deal #b34% more attack damage.
Fortified creatures receive #b33% less attack damage.
Whenever the #pImpossible #pRequest is transformed, if you fulfilled the condition, you gain #b1 #yStrength. If you didn't fulfill the request, the enemy gains #b2 #yStrength.
